comment: * A transliterator that converts all letters (as defined by * UCharacter.isLetter()) to lower case, except for those * letters preceded by non-letters. The latter are converted to title * case using UCharacter.toTitleCase(). * @author Alan Liu

variables.name: sourceTargetUtility
variables.comment: NOTE: normally this would be static, but because the results vary by locale....

methods.name: protected synchronized void handleTransliterate(Replaceable text, Position offsets, boolean isIncremental)
public void addSourceTargetSet(UnicodeSet inputFilter, UnicodeSet sourceSet, UnicodeSet targetSet)

methodNames: protected synchronized void handleTransliterate(Replaceable text, Position offsets, boolean isIncremental)
